contentList.content: After making a melee attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to the damage it deals.
This blade is enveloped in shadow.
The magic of your blade forms a barrier around you that protects you from harm, and causes you to inflict additional force damage.

Your barrier blocks damage equal to its charges and then loses 1 charge.

While the barrier is active, you deal additional force damage equal to the number of charges remaining. Dealing damage with the Night's Edge adds 1 charge, up to half your level, rounded up.
Conjure the Night's Edge to your hands.
The cleric bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon's damage is magical.
